ADA_COMBATBANNER.Settings.announceTurn.H: Create a chat message for each combatant's turn.
Create a chat message at the start of each round.
ADA_COMBATBANNER.Settings.defaultColor.H: Color to use if one cannot be found from the user, or if Force Default Color is on. Hexadecimal only.
ADA_COMBATBANNER.Settings.forceDefaultCo: Use the default color instead of the User's set color.
ADA_COMBATBANNER.Settings.colorRules.Hin:
'User Colors' will pull from the foundry user's associated color for any tookens owned by that user, including the GM.
'Default Color Only' will use the default color in the settings for all banners. 'Disposition Colors' will use the colors found in the setting here for friendly, hostile, and neutral actors.
